Commands.Earthquake: 1-HIT AoE melee BRV+HP attack  HP Damage is divided equally amongst all enemies  Inflicts 1 stack of 「Stun」 to target for 4 turns (max is 5)  Grants 「Small Max BRV Up」 for 3 turns  When the total of 「Stun」 stacks on the enemy side is ≥ 5, turns to 「Earthquake+」   「Stun」 lowers Defense and Speed
Commands.Earthquake+: 2-HIT AoE melee BRV+HP attack  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to enemies afflicted with 「Stun」  HP Damage is divided equally amongst all enemies  High Action Delay  Cancels target's 「Stun」  Grants 「Small Max BRV Up」 for 3 turns
Commands.Homerun Swing: Raises BRV based on Attack  1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  Inflicts 1 stack of 「Stun」 to target for 4 turns (max is 5)  Grants 「Small Attack Up」 for 3 turns  When the total of 「Stun」 stacks on the enemy side is ≥ 5, turns to 「Homerun Swing+」
Commands.Homerun Swing+: Raises BRV based on Attack  2-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to enemies afflicted with 「Stun」  High Action Delay  Cancels target's 「Stun」  Grants 「Small Attack Up」 for 3 turns
Commands.Set Stun BRV Up: Raises BRV based on Attack  Inflicts 1 stack of 「Stun」 to target for 4 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Whirling Mace: 6-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + single target HP attack  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target  BRV stolen can overflow up to 200% Max BRV  Raises allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt  Inflicts 5 (max) stacks of 「Stun」 to target for 4 turns  Delays target by 1 turn  Initiates a Chase Sequence

Passives.Earthquake Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Earthquake ,  Earthquake+
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts
Passives.Homerun Swing Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Homerun Swing ,  Homerun Swing+
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Passives.Strong Airhead: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while en enemy is debuffed
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Slightly raises Attack and moderately raises Speed while buffed
Passives.Earthquake Extend: When using  Earthquake ,  Earthquake+ :- Inflicts  Small Defense Down  to target for 4 turnsWhen using  Earthquake :- Increases number of BRV hits to 2- Moderately raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Grants +1 stack of  Stun When using  Earthquake+ :- Increases number of BRV hits to 3- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 200% Max BRVWhile buffed:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+  BRV Attack+  has the following effects:- Increases the number of BRV hits to 2- Moderately raises BRV potency- Inflicts 1 stack of  Stun  to target for 4 turns
Passives.Debuff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Homerun Swing Extend: When using  Homerun Swing ,  Homerun Swing+ :- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on AttackWhen using  Homerun Swing :- Increases number of BRV hits to 2- Moderately raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Grants +1 stack of  Stun When using  Homerun Swing+ :- Increases number of BRV hits to 3- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 200% Max BRVWhile buffed:- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+  HP Attack+  has the following effects:- Raises BRV based on Attack before the HP attack- Inflicts 1 stack of  Stun  to target for 4 turns
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Set Stun BRV Up Extend: When using  Set Stun BRV Up , adds the following effects:- Tremendously raises critical hit rate for 3 turns- Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits for 3 turns

Weapons.Seismic Shaker CP: 35: Homerun Swing  use +1When using  Homerun Swing ,  Homerun Swing+ :- Raises BRV gain based on Attack- Raises BRV potency- Improves  Attack Up  and extends its durationWhen using  Homerun Swing :- Grants +1 stack of  Stun
Weapons.Skull Crusher CP: 15: When using  Earthquake ,  Earthquake+ :- Raises BRV potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Improves  Max BRV Up  and extends its durationWhen using  Earthquake :- Grants +1 stack of  Stun
Weapons.Ogre Hammer CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Whirling Mace
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Set Stun BRV Up  use +1Grants +1 stack of  Stun
